text: Aning gavgavir overiamɨn aneghoroghamim iti, eghtɨ aning Godɨn akamɨn gun mɨgeir dughiamɨn, aning mɨkɨmtɨ, amozim dughiar kamɨn izan kogham. Eghtɨ aning gavgavir dɨpabar amutɨ da bar ghuzimɨn otivamim iti. Egha uaghan gavgavir nguazimɨn gumazamiziba bizir kurar igharazibar amutɨ da me gasɨghasɨghamim iti. Dughiar kamɨn, aning bizir kabara amutɨ da aning ifongezɨ moghɨn otivam.
